players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob, any thoughts on who might be suspicious?"

You: "Bob: I think we should focus on identifying anyone who seems out of place or behaved suspiciously last night. Alice's death is concerning, and we need to work together to figure out what happened."
Charlie: "Bob, I agree that Alice's death is concerning. Diana's silence makes me uneasy. Any thoughts on that?"

You: "Bob: I believe we should all share any observations or suspicions we may have, no matter how small. Diana's silence last night was unusual and warrants further discussion. Let's keep an open mind as we try to uncover the truth behind Alice's death."
